overview: Devil's Covenant is a 1998 film made by a group of video game players, or clan, called Clan Phantasm. Produced through the machinima technique of recording actions in Quake, a 1996 first-person shooter video game by id Software, the work is the first feature-length machinima film, a major technical achievement. The work successfully combines acting with custom code, character models, and scripts. Written and directed by Eric Bakutis with notable voice acting by Bill Benners.
title: Devil's Covenant
